name: Celestial Odyssey

Help cute Pilot Celestia recover some Crystals on the dangerous Planet Anyris.

Note: This is an educational project done by following GameDevTv's 3D Unity Course: https://www.gamedev.tv/courses/

It's not supposed to be a full-blown game but I did put a lot of effort on it.
